publicwhip.spmotion: S3M-4685 Jim Tolson: Bruce Festival 2009—That the Parliament welcomes the Bruce Festival, taking place in Dunfermline, Scotland’s ancient capital city, on 15 and 16 August 2009, featuring jousting, storytelling, a re-enactment group, musicians and displays from local groups, including the Scottish Lime Centre, Dunfermline Heritage Trust, Historic Scotland and McDonald Armouries; notes that full details are available at www.visitdunfermline.com; further notes that the event attracted 12,000 visitors last year, and welcomes the positive effect that the festival will have on the cultural wellbeing of people across Fife and visitors to the area. Supported by: Rob Gibson*, Bob Doris*, Ross Finnie*, Kenneth Gibson*, John Park*, Mike Pringle*
S3M-4685 Bruce Festival 2009 (lodged on 12 August 2009) Robin Harper*, Bill Kidd*, Gil Paterson*, Jamie Hepburn*, Hugh O’Donnell*
S3M-4685 Bruce Festival 2009 (lodged on 12 August 2009) Aileen Campbell*
